searchableProductInfo.details: Gucci bag: brown leather, thick woven shoulder strap with designer stamped tassels and a luggage tag at side, front fold-over flap with a hook and tab fastening, weave trim, gold hardware, three internal compartments, two internal patch pockets, one internal zip-fastening pocket, brown suede lining. Designer color: Testa Moro Lamponato. Leather.
searchableProductInfo.title: Leather messenger bag
searchableProductInfo.editorsNotes: Gucci's classic messenger bag is a timeless accessory crafted from luxuriously soft brown leather. Finished with ornate braid and tassel detailing, this roomy piece will carry all your essentials in style. Partner it with skinny jeans and sleek sandals for a refined weekend look. Shown here with a Kenneth Jay Lane ring, Erickson Beamon bracelet, Gucci top and pants and a Michael Kors belt and sandals.
searchableProductInfo.sizeAndFit:
This bag fits on the shoulder
  • Width 13" / 34cm
  • Height 12" / 30cm
  • Depth 2" / 6cm
  • Handle Drop 13" / 34cm
